required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparative Evaluation of Self-assembling Peptide P11-4 Versus Tricalcium Phosphate Fluoride Varnish
clinical_study.official_title: Comparative Evaluation of Self-assembling Peptide P11-4 Versus Tricalcium Phosphate Fluoride Varnish in Remineralization of White Spot Lesions Among a Group of Egyptian Children : A Randomized Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the present study is to evaluate the success of Self-assembling Peptide P11-4 versus Tricalcium Phosphate Fluoride Varnish in remineralization of WSLs in primary dentition among a group of Egyptian children.

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of one year
primary_outcome.description: Remineralization of white spot lesions evaluated by DIAGNOdent laser pen

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of one year
secondary_outcome.description: Regression of caries evaluated by International Caries Detection and Assessment System (ICDAS) II

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of one year
secondary_outcome.description: Inactivation of active carious lesions evaluated by Lesion activity assessment (LAA-ICDAS)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Curodont Repair® ( monomeric self - assembling peptide P11-4 )
arm_group.description: Self assembling peptide P11-4 as Curodont Repair® can remineralize WSLs in a deeper manner than fluoride by guided enamel regeneration by forming a three-dimensional matrix within the subsurface body of an initial carious lesion to which calcium and phosphate ions found in natural saliva can bind and build de novo hydroxyapatite crystals.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Clinpro white varnish® ( Tricalcium Phosphate Fluoride Varnish, 5% F- )
arm_group.description: Fluoride varnish is the gold standard for treating WSLs.

intervention.description: Monomeric self - assembling peptide P11-4 ( Curodont Repair ) is a remineralizing agent applied to tooth surface after treating it with 3% sodium hypochlorite for 20 seconds then etching it with 37% phosphoric acid for 20 seconds followed by rinsing then dryness.
intervention.arm_group_label: Curodont Repair® ( monomeric self - assembling peptide P11-4 )

intervention.description: Tricalcium phosphate fluoride varnish, 5% F- ( Clinpro White Varnish ) is a remineralizing agent applied on tooth surface after mixing it with a brush onto the dosage guide.
intervention.arm_group_label: Clinpro white varnish® ( Tricalcium Phosphate Fluoride Varnish, 5% F- )

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Apparently healthy cooperative children
- Aging from 3-8 years old child
- Both genders
- Primary teeth with active WSLs on buccal or labial surfaces
- Patient and parent acceptance to treatment and maintenance of good oral hygiene
Exclusion Criteria:
- Restored teeth
- White spot lesions due to fluorosis
- Teeth with hypoplasia
- Lesions that require an invasive treatment
- Any pathology or concomitant medication affecting salivary flow or causing dry mouth
